sentences: Ma saan selleks ajaks k천ik saadavad 체lesanded valmis.
Ta on v채ga hea inimene ja tema saadavad omadused on talle v채ga kasulikud.
Need saadavad oskused on tema elu parimad omandid.
context: The word 'saadavad' in Estonian means something that can be reached or achieved, and it is commonly used to describe goals or tasks that are possible to complete.
